ComicInfo.Title: The Lair Of Dr. Brainchild
ComicInfo.Summary:
Somebody is robbing graves and the Living Corpse does not like it! The sinister and disturbed genius Doctor Brainchild is quickly perfecting his method of reanimating the dead while the cranky Living Corpse tracks him down. But when the twisted doc gets the upperhand on old Corpsie, there’s only one thing an undead hero can do…improvise.
